item.title: How a Cheap Drone Punctured Chernobyl’s Steel Shield During the Ukraine War
item.description: The steel shell that encloses the site of the world’s worst nuclear disaster was built to endure for a century. But war was a scenario its engineers n...

item.title: Trump’s Team Calls Europe ‘Pathetic’ in Leaked Signal Group Chat Messages
item.description: Trump officials have demanded more European military spending and questioned the continent’s values. Leaked messages show the depth of the rift.

item.title: Online Harm Gangs Pose ‘Unprecedented Risk’ to Teens, Says U.K. Crime Agency

item.title: U.S. Lifts Millions in Bounties on Senior Taliban Officials
item.description: The move was a significant shift toward leaders of the Haqqani network, which was behind some of the deadliest attacks during the war in Afghanistan.
